name: Progressive Breakout
description:
Bored of normal breakout? Need a change? Enter progressive breakout! The bricks keep raining down while you race to destroy them. Now with four different difficulties, progressive breakout can be customized to what every you want!

Progressive breakout is a breakout game where the bricks keep on generating. The longer you play and the harder the difficulty both increase the score that you get per brick.

Made for the GameDevLeague BrickBreaker jam this game was made in 72(?) hours. I hope you enjoy in and please go vote for it at http://beta.gamedevleage.com/

Controls

Left and right arrow keys to move the paddle

C to insert coin

ESCAPE to quit

Credits

Programming: Nathan "Bottersnike" Taylor
